user_query: I'm planning a weekend getaway with my friends and want to make it fun-filled. Can you suggest some hilarious jokes to keep us entertained during the trip? Additionally, we need the latest wrestling news to discuss our favorite wrestlers. Moreover, find a hotel near our destination for accommodation.

TaskList.description: Gather a collection of hilarious jokes to keep the group entertained during the trip.
Fetch the latest news in wrestling to discuss favorite wrestlers.
Find a hotel near the chosen destination for accommodation during the getaway.
